CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Common Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of common stock.

CommonStockSharesAuthorized.label: Common Stock, Shares Authorized
CommonStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of common shares permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

CommonStockSharesIssued.label: Common Stock, Shares, Issued
CommonStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of common shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders (includes common shares that were issued, repurchased and remain in the treasury). These shares represent capital invested by the firm's shareholders and owners, and may be all or only a portion of the number of shares authorized. Shares issued include shares outstanding and shares held in the treasury.

CommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Common Stock, Shares, Outstanding
CommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares of common stock outstanding. Common stock represent the ownership interest in a corporation.

CommonStockValue.label: Common Stock, Value, Issued
CommonStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable common stock (or common stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable common shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAllowanceFor.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Allowance for Credit Loss
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAllowanceFor.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

EarningsPerShareBasic.label: Earnings Per Share, Basic
EarningsPerShareBasic.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

EarningsPerShareDiluted.label: Earnings Per Share, Diluted
EarningsPerShareDiluted.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPCompensati.label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Compensation Expense
EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPCompensati.description: The amount of plan compensation cost recognized during the period.

EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPDeferredSh.label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Deferred Shares, Fair Value
EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPDeferredSh.description: Fair value of unearned shares held by the employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPNumberOfCo.label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Number of Committed-to-be-Released Shares
EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPNumberOfCo.description: The shares that, although not legally released, will be released by a future scheduled and committed debt service payment and will be allocated to employees for service rendered in the current accounting period. The ESOP documents typically define the period of service to which the shares relate. ESOP shares are released to compensate employees directly, to settle employer liabilities for other employee benefits, and to replace dividends on allocated shares that are used for debt service.

EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPNumberOfSu.label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Number of Suspense Shares
EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPNumberOfSu.description: Shares contributed to the ESOP that have not yet been released, committed to be released, or allocated to participant accounts. Suspense shares generally collateralize ESOP debt.

EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPSharesInES.label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Shares in ESOP
EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPSharesInES.description: Sum of the allocated, committed-to-be-released and suspense shares of the entity held by the plan.

PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of an equity security.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Secured Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash inflow from amounts received from issuance of long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt secured debt.

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Held-to-maturity Securities
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: The cash inflow associated with the maturity, prepayments and calls (requests for early payments) of debt securities designated as held-to-maturity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesEmployeeSto.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Employee Stock Ownership Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesEmployeeSto.description: Number of shares of capital stock issued (purchased by employees) in connection with an employee stock ownership plan.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesOther.description: Number of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Stock Ownership Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.description: Aggregate value of stock issued during the period as a result of employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

UnearnedESOPShares.label: Unearned ESOP Shares
UnearnedESOPShares.description: Fair value of unearned shares for all classes of common stock and nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP). Includes the sale of shares or the issuance treasury shares to an ESOP.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesEmployeeSto.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares, Employee Stock Ownership Plan Shares Not Committed to be Released
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesEmployeeSto.description: Number of employee stock ownership plan (ESOP) shares that have not been committed to be released determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that these shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.
